scripts.deploy_to_text: gcloud beta functions deploy wavToText --trigger-resource teraconn_voice_for_transcription --trigger-event google.storage.object.finalize --region asia-northeast1 --memory 128 --timeout 540 --runtime nodejs8
scripts.deploy_to_16k: gcloud beta functions deploy wavTo16Khz --trigger-resource teraconn_raw_voice --trigger-event google.storage.object.finalize --region asia-northeast1 --memory 128 --timeout 540 --runtime nodejs8
scripts.deploy_to_ogg: gcloud beta functions deploy wavToOgg --trigger-resource teraconn_raw_voice --trigger-event google.storage.object.finalize --region asia-northeast1 --memory 128 --timeout 540 --runtime nodejs8
